news.content: Invited Tutorial Speaker at [Astro AI Workshop 2025](https://astroai.cfa.harvard.edu/workshop/details.html): 'Exploring Compositional Generalization of Neural Networks through Synthetic Experiments'.

Invited Speaker at [Prague Synapse 2025](https://praguesynapse.cz/): 'New News: System-2 Fine-tuning for Robust Integration of New Knowledge'. [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OWApNJhRBivc9jkEZ2pMMFR96i3hz9SI/view?usp=sharing).
